main event: A witness reported seeing a round, white object about 40-50 feet in diameter with a black band around it, making a whistling sound and moving rapidly.
interesting points: The object moved with a black band around it and made a whistling sound.
The witness stated they had never seen anything like it before.
The object was observed for approximately 10-15 minutes.
The witness called the local air force base to report the incident.
The report includes hand-drawn sketches of the object, including details like a dome on top and lights around the perimeter.
sighted object: round, white object with a black band
photographs: no, the report does not include any photographs
